page.title: 15A DAY IN THE LIFE ...
page.content: ANNE MILLAR,PRIMARY SIX PUPIL AT TEALING PRIMARY SCHOOL. "I GET UP AT 7.30,HAVE MY BREAKFAST THEN FEED MY PET RABBITS AND THE HENS.I GO TO SCHOOL AT 8.30.I USUALLY CYCLE BUT GET A LIFT IF IT IS A WET DAY.I ATTEND TEALING SCHOOL WHERE WE ARE TAUGHT MATHEMATICS,ENGLISH,HISTORY ,GEOGRAPHY ETC..WE GO SWIMMING ONCE A WEEK AND I HAVE PASSED MY SURVIVAL 2 BADGE.I CARRY PACKED LUNCH TO SCHOOL. THIS YEAR FOR THE FIRST TIME WE HAD A COMBINED SCHOOL SPORTS WITH AUCHTERHOUSE AND STRATHMARTINE SCHOOLS AT STRATHMARTINE. TEALING WON THE DRONLEY CUP. SCHOOL FINISHES AT 3.30.I CYCLE HOME AND HELP MY MOTHER TO PREPARE TEA.I USUALLY PEEL THE POTATOES.AFTER TEA I WATCH T.V. OR GO OUT TO PLAY.ON MONDAYS I GO TO THE GUIDES WHILE MY BROTHER GOES TO THE SCOUTS."
